confirmDelete: Do you want to delete the question?

context.canTypeToCreate: You can type in the select bar to add new contexts.
context.title: Contexts

editor.pasteQuestionHere: Type/Paste your questions here separated with a new line
editor.typePressAddAnswer: Type and press enter to add an answer. Use ALT+Enter for a new line

form.addMoreQuestionsPlural: Add {count} more questions to make your Q&A more resilient
form.addMoreQuestionsSingular: Add 1 more question to make your Q&A more resilient
form.chatbotWillRandomlyChoose: Chatbot will answer randomly from these alternatives
form.confirmDeleteQuestion: Are you sure you want to delete this question? Question and answer alternatives will be deleted as well.
form.disabledTooltip: This Q&A will not be displayed to users.
form.duplicateAnswer: You have already written this answer
form.duplicateQuestion: You have already written this question
form.emptyState: Tap + in the toolbar to add your first question.
form.incompleteTooltip: This Q&A will use exact match only.
form.missingAnswer: Leaving answer field empty will disable this question.
form.missingQuestion: Leaving question field empty will disable this question.
form.quickAddAlternative: Press {shortcut} while inline to add new alternative quickly
form.writeAtLeastTwoMoreQuestions: Write at least 2 question alternatives to enable machine learning
form.writeFirstQuestion: Write a sentence that your user could write to ask his/her question
form.writeTheAnswer: Write the answer to the question
form.writingSameQuestion: Writing the same question twice will disable this Q&A.

hint.addMoreQuestions: Add {moreQuestions} to make your Q&A more resilient.
hint.willBeExact: This Q&A will use {exactMatchOnly}. To enable machine learning, add at leastd {remaining} more {remaining, plural, one {question} other {questions}}
hint.willBeIgnored: This Q&A will be ignored, start adding questions to make it trainable.

import.botContains: The bot contains {qnaCount} questions and {cmsCount} content elements.
import.clearQuestionsThenInsert: Clear existing questions, then insert my new questions and create/update content elements
import.fileContains: Your file contains {fileQnaCount} questions and {fileCmsCount} content elements.
import.insertNewQuestions: Insert the new questions from my file and create/update associated content elements
import.notAbleToExtract: We were not able to extract any data from your file. Either the file is empty, or it doesn't match any known format.
import.selectJsonHelp: Select a JSON file exported from the module QNA. You will see a summary of modifications when clicking on Next
import.whatLikeDo: What would you like to do?

noQuestionsYet: No questions have been added yet.
question: Question
redirectsAssociated: There are redirects associated to this questions, you can view them in the edit form
